com.anachat.chatsdk.uimodule.chatuikit.messages

Class MessageHolders.BaseMessageViewHolder<MESSAGE extends IMessage>

  • java.lang.Object
    • RecyclerView.ViewHolder
      • com.anachat.chatsdk.uimodule.chatuikit.commons.ViewHolder<MESSAGE>
        • com.anachat.chatsdk.uimodule.chatuikit.messages.MessageHolders.BaseMessageViewHolder<MESSAGE>
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    MessageHolders.BaseIncomingMessageViewHolder, MessageHolders.BaseOutcomingMessageViewHolder
    Enclosing class:
    MessageHolders

    public abstract static class MessageHolders.BaseMessageViewHolder<MESSAGE extends IMessage>
extends ViewHolder<MESSAGE>
    The base class for view holders for incoming and outcoming message. You can extend it to create your own holder in conjuction with custom layout or even using default layout.
